title: Lakeside Getaway on the NSW Central Coast
description: Discover the beauty of the NSW Central Coast with a relaxing stay including daily breakfast and a late checkout at The Clan Terrigal. With options for couples and families, you can treat those closest to you to a chilled-out getaway surrounded by area’s beaches, hiking trails and restaurants.

title: Central Coast Beachside Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
This beachfront hotel isn’t just another place to stay - it’s your gateway to coastal excellence on the stunning Central Coast. It strikes the perfect balance between relaxed beach vibes and upscale comfort. Whether you're planning a family vacation, a romantic escape or even a business trip with a view, this spot has got you covered.

Take your pick between the heated outdoor pool or the Pacific Ocean just steps away. Hit up the fully-equipped fitness centre if you need to stay on top of your fitness game, or if relaxation is more your speed, endota spa is calling your name with a range of treatments. Foodies will be in heaven with several onsite restaurants serving the very best of the land and the sea.

This hotel sits on one of the Central Coast's most beloved stretches of sand. Surf, swim or simply laze about, the choice is yours. For a dash of adventure, lace up your hiking boots and tackle the nearby Skillion lookout for jaw-dropping coastal panoramas. The charming town of Terrigal is right on your doorstep, filled with cute cafes, boutique shops and local markets.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Terrigal Pacific, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Pine Tree Lane, Terrigal, New South Wales 2260, Australia

title: NSW Central Coast Beachfront Escape Just 90 Minutes from Sydney with Endota Spa
description: For dazzling ocean panoramas and Miami Beach vibes, make a beeline for Crowne Plaza Terrigal Pacific, an IHG Hotel, just 90 minutes from Sydney along NSW's Central Coast. Dine at Seasalt for fresh seafood dinners and divine views of the South Pacific Ocean, while fun times await at Terrigal Beach House outdoor beer garden, where you'll get your kicks with live entertainment overlooking Terrigal Beach. For a spot of pampering, book a massage or glowing facial at the onsite Endota Spa.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Terrigal, an IHG Hotel
